node.html: Developed a module, to scan across Google Datacenters and capture various parameters to gauge the state of private clouds.

Key developer for Myntra Financial Planner, a financial planning tool tailored to the fashion e-commerce world. Made the data pipeline robust, and optimized flows to make them faster and reduce heap memory usage.
Did a POC to build a model, which automatically grades new fashion styles based on Image Similarity and historical sales data. The project was developed using Python and Visenze API.
Developed a algorithmic trading script, which leverages the volatility of the stock market to make trades automatically, to make marginal profits and minimize loss using Renko charts in Python.
Part of the team that developed Replenishment Planner, which automated the inward flow for Top Selling Styles on Myntra, which reduced the TAT for Purchase Order generation to under 10 minutes.
Contributed to ui-kit, an internal ReactJs framework, which facilitated faster design development of new products.
Built the Order Indent creation flow for Inseason Buying which reduced the TAT for Purchase Order generation from 7 days to 2 days.
Individually developed curation engine end to end. This system helped curate styles on Myntra, garnering higher traffic positivity coming mainly from much lower brokenness ~200k additional sessions.
A script to compile the comics into PDF.

ChainRank is a semantically aware LexRank algorithm for automatic text summarization. ChainRank provides huge improvements on LexRank by using Lexical Chains to extract meaningful sentences, and then using these to provide bias to the sentence connectivity relations determined by LexRank.

A car racing game Torcs was simulated using Ultrasonic sensors and ADXL accelerometer. The serial communication between the Arduino and the game was done using the pySerial and pyautogui libraries in python.
Developing a virtual keyboard which can be used to type using dynamic tracking of the eye pupil movement using the SentiGaze SDK.

Developed a Machine Learning model using the K-means and K-prototype clustering algorithms, to build Size profiles based on the order/return history of each user. These profiles are used for size recommendation, enhancing the user's shopping experience.

Mining data from ESPN APIs and Twitter to come up with a novel way to analyze the transfer rumours based on squad dynamics, financial conditions, market information to predict the probability of a certain transfer.
IPL Fantasy League, building a Web App where users can build their own teamsfrom a pool of players and compete amongst themselves to win. Using Django & MySQL.

frontmatter.title: Influence Based Ranking in a Social Network

node.html: Analysing the twitter social network to identify the most influential users with various algorithms using Apache Spark.

Studying the effect of introducting a referral bonus, in a crowdsourced web-based auction system. Worked on running simulations on social networks to understand the cause and effect of various parameters correlating to the success of the auction.
Built a game that is used to track and help improve the progress of children with dyscalculia. The game had adaptive difficulty levels, which helped children get better, and overcome dyscalculia.
Developed a reverse dictionary where in the application returns suitable words on giving a phrase as input, by searching in online dictionaries.
Developed an offline peer to peer networking software allowing users to share files through the network using overlay networks and multi-cast sockets in Java.
